website_summaries.verdict: Set of 19 plastic cupping cups with vacuum tube.
pros: Cups are made with shockproof and heatproof "baby bottle plastic" that can be sterilized with boiling water
Strong cups are easy to clean
Designed to leave no marks or scratches
cons: There were complaints about decreased suction with use
Cannot be used with oil or lubricant for sliding cup massage

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING DESCRIPTION about boiling the cups!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set vs the cheaper one because in the description it states that the cups CAN be boiled. However upon opening there is a bold note in the directions and it is clearly stated in the instructions that they cannot be boiled. This was disappointing, I would have chose a different set! I ONLY bought this because it could be boiled. MISLEADING DESCRIPTION!
customer_reviews.author: vman

customer_reviews.title: They break in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for less than a month in a physical therapy practice and they are all cracking and breaking. We are super disappointed in the “premium” cups
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Cupping is a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a massage therapist and use these daily on my clients. This is the second set that I’ve purchased to have as a back up. I’ve used them for years and have been so beyond happy with them. When I don’t receive enough body work for myself my boyfriend uses these cups on me and it’s what gets me through my days. They are just as beneficial as glass cups!
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for a product that seems to offer significant relief
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to use this cupping set as I had no experiences with cupping prior to this purchase. It was super easy to use, and although slightly uncomfortable at first, became relaxing. Definitely helped to relieve the chronic discomfort I have in my neck and upper back. Left some pretty dark marks on one side of my body, which the internet says is stagnant blood being moved and detoxed. I had absolutely no problems with suction or using any of the parts. Will continue to use and see the longterm benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Connector Cracked
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this cupping set, at first, but after only a few uses, the connector on the extension tube cracked. It seems like it should be made of rubber or silicone rather than hard plastic. I wish it was returnable. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband. He runs everyday and runs all the marathons he can. He is always sore and when I saw Michael Phelps at the Olympics I bought those too. My husband says if works and I don't have to massage him for hours anymore. I put the cups where he wants them and remove them after 15 or 20 minutes et voila! It is easy to use and the instructions are available in English. I still haven't figured out what the red things that look like batteries are for. The cups are to be applied mechanically so...anyway good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle A

customer_reviews.title: Best cupping set
customer_reviews.text: Best cupping set. I received cupping from my massage therapist and this was the set she had. I do it to myself but have to admit it is not the same as having someone do it for you. Great to have around in a pinch and great price.
customer_reviews.author: J. garcia

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: I have had these cups less than a month, and the tops are either cracked or broken. I have never had this happen, but as a medical provider who uses the cupping method a lot, I need reliable equipment. I do not know if anyone else has had this issue, but this has been a massive inconvenience for my athletes and me. If you are planning on using these cups, frequently do not get this brand.
customer_reviews.author: J.Cook

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade, I use these everyday on clients.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a licensed massage therapist and this is the brand I use everyday on my clients. When you clean them, clean them with a simple Clorox wipes. Do now wash with anything else. They will lose suction power over time. These are very effective and professional grade.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Vavra

customer_reviews.title: I would like to return it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the plastic part you attach to the cup (the pump) cracked for no reason. So now, air will not get suctioned out of the cup. I would like to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Miracles
customer_reviews.text: I broke my back in an accident and discovered cupping from my acupuncturist. It really does make a difference in the areas you treat. This has been a great set for a couple months with no issues. Just make sure you apply them on the correct spots and not directly on an injury. They are easy to clean and have propped suction. They will stay even without using oil. I highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy! Great Value! I'm a Strongman and Powerlifting a competitor, my body often takes a beating from the hours of hard training. Cupping has helped me recover faster and treat nagging injuries. This set in particular is quite good. My only complaint Is the cheap hose that comes with this set. The hose tends to slip off the cup if it's not being actively held in place by your hand. Really this is no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: Great and can be placed in boiling water
customer_reviews.text: Great and best part is being able to put it in boiling water to kill viruses and germs (10-15 seconds).
customer_reviews.author: Bassam

customer_reviews.title: Very good highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Pros- I highly recommend this item because it’s easy to use and my boyfriend he’s been having a lot of shoulder pain so I decided to get this and it’s awesome! Cons- be careful with the blue top part very delicate
customer_reviews.author: Yashira

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It comes with a carrying case with a handle, which is really nice to have. For me, I’ve used 3 times and it has not helped my chronic low back pain, in fact it seemed to aggravate it more- but it may take more time and I just may have a bigger issue going on. The cups seem sturdy and everything seems good so far. Time will tell if everything lasts. It has a decent amount of cups as well, though it could stand to have a few more large ones and one very small one (there is one small one but I’m talking smaller) for facial. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend the cupping set
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend the cupping set, the case is perfect to store and travel. Both my husband and I use the cupping and find it to be effective for our health and circulation. Easy to use, even in hard to reach places of the body, for the extention tubing aids in those areas. Reminder: you must apply a oil to help the cups to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: P. Watts

customer_reviews.title: I bought these cups in an effort to help a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cups in an effort to help a lot of arthritic joints I have. The process seems to help, but this product didn't. Both ends of the extension tube cracked and lost suction, within a few months. I tried various ways to fix it with sealants and to permanently seal one cup in, but it was hopeless. It's my fault I never brought it up with the manufacturer, but it's junk so what's the use.
customer_reviews.author: Mario A Boccarossa

customer_reviews.title: The only relief 🎈
customer_reviews.text: Love these! After two Dr. chopping their way through my hips and another telling me I have fibromyalgia. A therapist months later did cupping on my legs and by God did I have spaghetti legs again after. I finally got my own kit to use at home and soooo happy cupping helps relieve my pain and leaves me with a euphoric feeling. This set is great love the smaller sizes I can use on the the bottoms of my feet. The extra cord is great when I’m working on lower back and back of my legs! Kudos guys!
customer_reviews.author: Mazin Shahin

customer_reviews.title: Great cups, and very affordable!
customer_reviews.text: These are such a great alternative to those old fashioned glass ones that you had to heat! They’re so easy to use and come in a nice little suit case! Only thing is that they take a couple minutes to clean (but any cups need cleaning) since you should apply a little bit of oil to the area to apply for better suction. The oil just gets inside the cups so you have to clean it. I just use some alcohol and paper towel and works like a charm! These are also the cups I saw in an OMM doctors office!
customer_reviews.author: Katrin

customer_reviews.title: tension relief
customer_reviews.text: Boy, am I glad I found these bad boys. So much relief. I am a big wimp, and fire cupping has always been something that I was scared of having done on me. I have been through a few sessions of regular cupping as well as fire cupping with glass of course. Had to purchase my own set so I could get them done at my convenience. I would recommend these for those with muscle tension!
customer_reviews.author: Forever Filipina

customer_reviews.title: Very effective. Make sure you know what you are doing.
customer_reviews.text: I am a licensed massage therapist and I am a very big fan of cupping. The benifits are great and I use these regularly to maintain my own body! The hand pump system makes it so easy to reach behind myself and place on my own back. However, i urge anybody to get trained before you go into it because you can cause some damage such as blistering if you leave them on too long. Also, aftercare is super important so you need to know what to expect and how to care for your body after cupping.
customer_reviews.author: Ryiah

customer_reviews.title: Great cupping set
customer_reviews.text: Great first cupping set, really affordable and has a lot of pieces, does what it’s supposed to and all the pieces are durable. Cupping has always been incredibly helpful for my muscle tension and this is a lot more convenient than paying to see a massage therapist bi weekly. Definitely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Raechel Zemaitis

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kit Just Haven't Used It Too Many Times
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the overall kit, easy to cary around, and the suction power is really strong. But you can control that my the number of pumps you give it. As for pain relief I cannot really say. I used it on the swelling of my feet but I had no pain, just swelling. However, it did help the swelling go down.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffy

customer_reviews.title: Great item for good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. I love that it has it's own pump and very easy to use to create suction without having to use matches, etc... to create the suction in the suction cups. This item comes with different size suction cups and is great to use of the whole back, etc...
customer_reviews.author: MrIceMan

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a toy, horrible quality. Broke during the first use...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and broke immediately during the first use. The suction power is minuscule, the quality of the plastic is below subpar and the whole thing looks like it was meant to be a toy. The statement "premium quality" is probably meant as a joke, by the way. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: K. O.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, worth the money. Now instead of paying 70 dollars per cupping session, I do my own and save so much money!
customer_reviews.author: CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: The cups are all small and mostly the same size.
customer_reviews.text: The cups are all small and mostly the same size. In contrast the KangZhu cup set had a variety of sizes. Cup variety was useful, but the KangZhu pump broke in a few days. A variety of cup sizes combined with a good pump is all I'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: bill duffe

customer_reviews.title: extremely effective
customer_reviews.text: It cost me 30 dollars with insurance to have this done with a physical therapist. Now having bought the product, I can do it as much as needed and save quite a bit of money. As long as you follow the directions and do a little research, it can be highly effective. I get knots in my shoulder that cause pain in my neck and this makes it easy to relieve the pain. It takes 5-10 minutes as advertised and the effects are immediate.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci Bug

customer_reviews.title: Good set, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good set, especially for the price. Not sure how long all the components will last but nice to have lots of cups. I don't have luck doing dynamic sliding with these cups but i'm also skinny and boney so it loses suction. Good tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Delivered with oil over the case
customer_reviews.text: I will update the review when I actually use the product, I wanted to warn buyers that my case arrived with an oil substance on it, nothing shipped in the box contained oil. There was no oil inside the case, so I will clean it up the best I can and go from there.
customer_reviews.author: DLM

customer_reviews.title: We've had this set for 4 years now and they still work great!
customer_reviews.text: We use these multiple times a week for straight cupping and massages and they have been one of the best purchases we've ever made. Not the easiest to use on yourself using the tube because it's awkward to remove it from the top, but it's perfectly doable. I would buy this set again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: c wil

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help my other half with sciatic pain, has definitely helped and happy I got the book they suggested. Very helpful and should be used more in physical therapy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I have been wasting money going to a massage therapist and paying 50 for cupping sessions. This cupping set is very good quality and so easy to use. My hubby and I will be making it a habit to use these on a regular basis. The relief we both need for back and neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Great product just cracked case hinge
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor has used this brand of cups for almost 2 years on me. I have had multiple neck surgeries & I have permanent nerve & muscle damage from my trauma. I understand not everyone responds to things the same since the human body is an amazing machine. But this does relieve pain & pulls toxins from my body & helps me get along until I see my therapist. The only complaint I have is that when this was delivered the back of the case- left lid hinge, is cracked about 3”. I hope the lid holds up as I don’t want to have to wait for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Need a bigger cups
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for someone just starting put with cupping. I would never recommend doing this to yourself unless you are a professional and certified, but if you know what you are doing this is a great kit. I would love it if they made bigger cups, but that's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: shannon caesar

customer_reviews.title: SOLID kit for the cost
customer_reviews.text: At the price I cant imagine a better cupping kit. It does exactly what you want it to do without being a super professional kit. Its mostly durable as in the cups are solid but the hose portion does come apart when you try to take it apart for the day, doesnt matter much since it goes back on and works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This item never came to me (due to where I lived at the time) . But had I used my friends cupping set and it is a great product . I will re-order this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: C H

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy using this product. I use it daily to treat myself and others and the cups are sturdy and easy to use. Everything is in good working condition even after using this for over 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Charisa S

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because of sciatic nerve issues. I came up with the idea from looking online and seeing the cost of cupping from massage salons. I bought it; used it and it works great. There are no bruises. The marks go away quickly. I'm happy with the product and I recommend giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: timothy s whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Don't set the clinic on fire!
customer_reviews.text: I was trained with glass fire cups and used to turn my nose up at plastic BUT these are so fast and easy to use without the danger and trouble of using fire. And the whole set is light and fits neatly in the suitcase so it's easy to transport. Don't risk burning your patient or setting the clinic on fire! I have not used the magnet feature so can't comment. It's an interesting idea.
customer_reviews.author: George Manlove

customer_reviews.title: it is nice to have the option to
customer_reviews.text: While I haven't had to use all of the cups at once, it is nice to have the option to. I love that it comes with the extension tube so I can reach areas on my back without help. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Foxee Roxee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleasantly surprised by this product as I never expect much, however, I am happy to say that this product exceeded my expectations. It is both easy to use and very effective for pain relief. I mainly use it for my legs as I have poor circulation, but have even successfully applied cups to my lower back. I feel amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a game changer. I have been using the old fashioned cupping method with water glasses and a heat source, which was very inconvenient. This product is simple to use, and I instantly felt relief from my shoulder pain after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Easy to wipe clean after use. Great suction and sizing to use on every muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Great professional set
customer_reviews.text: Great cupping set, I would recommend them. Professional set. They are plastic not glass as advertised. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marke Ttwain

customer_reviews.title: Very trustworthy and worth paying extra
customer_reviews.text: Extreme satisfaction with this product. Well made, tight and sturdy. I am way willing to pay more for this one than any others in the market. Worth the money. Working really well for my back pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: GC74

customer_reviews.title: Acuzone Cupping is a PREMIUM cupping set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of cups! This set is in a very nice case that keeps everything together and organized. The cups have great suction and the pump is well made - this is my 2nd set I've ordered (1st set was different brand, pump keeps coming apart) I love how much sturdier the Acuzone is!
customer_reviews.author: LaurieSheets

customer_reviews.title: Relief (yes looks like hickeys from a gorilla)
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia ..my message therapist uses this on my neck and back...I would like to do this at home in between...I can only afford so much treatment. I have used it 3 times since I have purchased...on my neck chest and thigh area. I like it so far...can’t wait until I am confident enough to do alone on my back. Done forget message oil. Though I need to learn the tearing of Facia from the mussle. Update i have this for over a year still love it.
customer_reviews.author: lor

customer_reviews.title: Cracked even when i flash boiled them
customer_reviews.text: Dont flash boil. Dont even dip these cups in boiling water or you'll crack them. Also, they offer a very weak suction for areas that have little fat infact they wont even stick.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Latona

customer_reviews.title: ... set 2 stars because while the cupping set is nice, the storage/suitcaae container is coming apart at the ...
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this set 2 stars because while the cupping set is nice, the storage/suitcaae container is coming apart at the seams and it's only a matter of time before the container falls apart. I will contact the seller to see if I can get a replacement container since I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, professional case and set! I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this is a REALLY nice set, in a really nice, professional looking case. I started using the cups about 5 minutes after I received them. I also received them a couple of days before the date they initially projected.
customer_reviews.author: Alys Grant

customer_reviews.title: Try it out!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My husband and I use it every week to help with injury/exercise rehab! I would highly recommend! Wish there was an even number of the large cups to keep cupping in your back symmetrical...but that’s my o my complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Suction
customer_reviews.text: While this came in a nice box, the hand pump could not produce enough suction to properly use the cups. The cups would come off after pumping over 20+ times, and this was on skin with no body hair. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Keefer

customer_reviews.title: This is a gift, my second time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first set for my office to use on my patients, and I was and still am, very impressed. I have dropped the cups on countless occasions and they do not crack, break or lose suction. If you are interested in cupping, definitely give this set a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like it really works! I use it on my lower back and the heel of my foot! I try to use it once every two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Truthfully 44

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about the quality of these for an affordable price. I was pleasantly surprised by the durability they have and how easy they are to use. I personally use them on my husband's back and it's so easy - it helps him with muscle pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amber s.

customer_reviews.title: Back pain bff
customer_reviews.text: Why pay hundreds of dollars at a PT when you can have a significant other or bestie do it for free?! These are amazing quality and provide extraordinary relief. I have major back issues and you can physically feel the release.
customer_reviews.author: Macie Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had application instructions for specific pain. Had to google search different products and application methods. Overall does the job once you know what you are doing
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: ... to use dry but my husband found they stick better if you use some oil
customer_reviews.text: It says to use dry but my husband found they stick better if you use some oil. Suction good, though somewhat painful if you pump too much. Takes a bit of finessing.
customer_reviews.author: Tina O

customer_reviews.title: One of the best sets i've owned
customer_reviews.text: High quality set. This is the highest quality set I've owned. I got the glass ones where you use fire but quit using them cause of burn risk and fire hazard. My other set lasted for a while but started to get worn out so i bought another set to add to it and to try to repair some of the o rings and seals and pegs. Then now i own this one. I don't really care for the pointers cause they make it uncomfortable to use. Other then that its a great set that is high in quality
customer_reviews.author: xxt2goodxx

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I need a boyfriend for the hard to reach areas but overall, easy to use! Works wonderfully. The instructions are on the box and everything is good quality
customer_reviews.author: AnythingCathleen

customer_reviews.title: Relief for an athlete!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an athlete training for the Olympic Trials this summer and I swear by cupping!!! My coach (a 2x Olympian) introduced me to this therapy a few months ago and I was skeptical at first, but after my first session I had instant relief! What I love most about this set is the pressure pointers. I use a trigger point chart to locate where my pain is and the trigger point that is connected to that area. I use this form of therapy about 2-3 times per week and plan on taking it with me when I travel for competitions next month.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna

customer_reviews.title: chinese parents approve!
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my parents who are very old school chinese. so they highly approve of this product. my dad said it's very well made and enjoys using it whenever he needs pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: ahhhchooo

customer_reviews.title: Great release
customer_reviews.text: I am a massage therapist. Self care is one of the most difficult things and often I come home and am too tired. This takes seconds and does some great myofascial release to get a lasting effect. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ariyah

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUPPING SET.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set, ordered this to replace an older set. I absolutely love these. The extension makes it easy to cup areas on myself. I cup peoples backs a lot, and this set allows me enough of the same size cups to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Zengurl

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice set!
customer_reviews.text: The only issues I had was the gun wasn't completely assembled when I open the set for the first time but it was easily fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Teter

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean and easy to carry around
customer_reviews.text: i love getting instant relief when my shoulders are hurting! great for my clients and i love that it has an attachable hose for when i want to use it on myself. easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of cupping therapy but I think the packaging could be a little better. The case that it's in will break over time, not anytime soon but it's cheap tho.
customer_reviews.author: Vito

customer_reviews.title: Quality set
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality cupping set! Very durable and versatile. I love having all the different sizes. My only complaint is that the case broke down within 6 months because of the thin plastic corners. But, other than that I have no complaints about the actual cups
customer_reviews.author: Charlemae G.

customer_reviews.title: Great cupping set
customer_reviews.text: Very very happy with this set! Suction is great, along with the quality and quantity of cups! Great product and helps my clients manage their pain!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Solid product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I work in outpatient orthopedics and use this frequently. For the price, the quality is surprisingly sound. I can get better suction than some of my co-workers kits that were pricier.
customer_reviews.author: Momlife

customer_reviews.title: I love using this set paired to my original glass fire ...
customer_reviews.text: I love using this set paired to my original glass fire set which was very limited and heavy this set works well as efficient I feel like I can travel with the easier and I feel like the results or more last perfect for your therapeutic needs
customer_reviews.author: Numia  Barabas

customer_reviews.title: Used for fibromyalgia muscle aches
customer_reviews.text: I have two cracked discs in my back that cause me to have a lot of fibromyalgia pain in my leg muscles. For the price it works great. It doesn’t completely eliminate the pain, but enough to give me some of my energy back (you fibromyalgia folks know what I’m taking about!!!) I use at least once daily for best results. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product.
customer_reviews.text: bought this for the wife and we really like to use them frequently as we are super busy with work. can't say enough as to we highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Evlmarine

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. It does the job. Now this isn’t a clinical grade cupping set, but it’s high quality for your everyday at home cupping. Quick note to potential buyers: it’s important to sanitize the cups regularly for hygiene purposes. I liked this set so much I bought 2 additional sets. One was for my parents who have muscle cramps from old age and another one was for my uncle to help with his at home physical therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Vang

customer_reviews.title: Genius
customer_reviews.text: It is very effective and works very well one thing I will note on the areas that you use them on they leave very noticeable marks but don’t panic they do fade away in a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good cups
customer_reviews.text: These work well. They don't always adhere very well and have to be set a couple times. But when they stick they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H Dammert

customer_reviews.title: Miracle set
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered and tried many cupping set but this one truly stands apart. The best till now. Relieves pain as per the description. Easy to use. Use it once a week and i feel so much better than before 100%satisfied. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kishore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They are great quality and they really do help pain relief. 10 stars! Would buy again. You do lot need to buy a more expensive kit trying to improve the quality of the product. This is everything you need and more.
customer_reviews.author: hannah king

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, effective, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything works, very durable, have used 40-50 times. The cups have fallen off my Bed onto the hardwood floor several times, no cracks or breaks. I’ve been using consistently for 6 months
customer_reviews.author: RealJoshTv

customer_reviews.title: The best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very easy to use and I love that you have control over the suction (based on the number of pumps).
customer_reviews.author: FBrooks

customer_reviews.title: Use to go to acupuncture, now I can do it at home!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Acupuncturist no longer takes my insurance so I was looking on getting a set myself! This is SO easy, such a good price, and does the job!! You will be sore if you aren’t use to cupping before!!! 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Can self apply and we’ll made!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to get cupping done professionally for years at $30-$50 a pop. I absolutely love that I can now do it at home. All the relief with half the price tag. Well quality and the pump is easy to use so you can apply it to yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Edan J Gelt

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the price. I use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Starr Porter

customer_reviews.title: NEED EXPERIENCE TO USE
customer_reviews.text: You receive at lot of product for the price. However, this IS a difficult product to use. You need plenty of practice and technique to get this down properly. I had to have my own massage therapist teach me how to use this, and STILL I have difficulty. In addition, the hose attachment should come in various lengths so you can use this product by yourself easier.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Purchase for any athlete
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily around my thighs and hips from past injuries and I have significantly increased my range of motion. I would highly recommend this cupping set.
customer_reviews.author: Young Donnie T

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: A little skeptical, but it actually works to release tight and sore muscles. Just have to be prepared for the hicky bruises that are left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Yo Panda

customer_reviews.title: Amanda Lendrick approves of these cups
customer_reviews.text: Used it from every where from ankle, knees, tri, quads and hammies. Really great for immediate relief of muscle fatigue. You
customer_reviews.author: Oh, it’s that guy

customer_reviews.title: Used frequently on myself and patients, holding strong 7 + years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set with rather low expectations, due to the very reasonable price. My set has lasted over seven years, for personal & professional use. The pump handle did crack, but it was easily replaced for a few dollars. I can’t recommend this product enough. I tell all my patients & friends to buy a set. It’s easy to use and the tune extension allows one to cup themself on any area that can be reached to scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Cleveland-Peck

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. The traditional way of cupping compare to this product is absolutely different. Don't buy it it's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Boi Truong

customer_reviews.title: loved it so much I bought two and have recommended ...
customer_reviews.text: loved it so much I bought two and have recommended them to dozens of people. I will continue to recommend this product. Durable, made well and great case, easy to store. These are easy to clean, simply flash boil for a few seconds. The extension hose is great and so are the red acupressure points included. These will also make great gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Ammi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very effective!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set and easy to use! I bought this as a cupping beginner, but it was very easy to figure out. High quality and a great price, too! It's helped my husband and I so much with back pain, while helping detox at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Block

customer_reviews.title: buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they changed my life! Make sure you know what you are doing, and research before hand. There are many ways to really mess yourself up with these if you dont use them right.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Stover

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: It works great as my other one but it is missing the metal pin thing you stick in the middle
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, better than cheap ones. Holds suction easier.
customer_reviews.text: The cheap cupping will not lock the air hole. This will lock the air hole even when cupping upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Game Junkie

customer_reviews.title: High quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product that works very well. Do have a professional show you how to use it and watch you test it on yourself. It is a little difficult to get to some places on your own back as anything would be.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D

customer_reviews.title: A must for pain
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to be used. Well packed item and I wasn’t able to use it, but overall the product is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sara kanouna

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, it exceeded my expectations! I will be buying more. The only thing I could say is I wish they had a mix between large,medium and small. Rather than it looks like medium and small ones. But still very satisfied! If you are debating...get it! Great quality for the price as well.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The quality is so good. It looks heavy duty plastic. I love to use it. Its the same brand we us in our physicaltherapy clinic.
customer_reviews.author: crisabelle

customer_reviews.title: Cupping away my quarantine
customer_reviews.text: These cups have been a lifesaver during quarantine. Get them. Your stagnant body will thank you. Um, I guess some people have had breakage problems? I’d say be gentle when pulling the pump off the cup? Anyway, I haven’t had any breakage problems. Hope I didn’t just jinx myself.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

product_meta.title: Premium Quality Cupping Set w/ 19 Cups ***BEST CUPPING SET IN KOREA***
product_meta.description: Cupping is an ancient Chinese method of message for comfort. A partial vacuum is created in cups placed on the skin either by means of heat or suction. This draws up the underlying tissues. Cupping is the best deep tissue massage available. Cupping, the technique, is very useful and very safe and can be easily learned and incorporated into your family health practices. The new cups have done away with the traditional firing. This has made the application of the cups easy and safely. It has not only improved efficacy but also simplified the procedures of cupping therapy. The improved plastic cups for ancient Chinese cupping therapy are now available for supply. They are easier to be handled and safer to be used for massage at home. In China, the new cups are very popular for family cupping massage. CAUTION: Thoroughly clean skin and remove body hair before cupping. Excessive body hair will result in weak suction (not strong). Do not exert excessive force when attaching the extension tube to the cups to prevent the tube from cracking. Pressing down too firmly will cause the extension tube to crack. *Not recommended for slide cupping massage. Our company is NOT responsible for damage to cups, which may result from slide cupping technique or any massage techniques. **Please note that all the cupping cups are disposable** Due to customer's feedback, K.S. Choi Corp Premium Cupping Sets will not include the red plastic pointers any longer with our cupping sets. The red plastic pointers were deemed uneffective. So, we have removed them from our sets. We apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused.
feature_bullets: NOTICE to all customers: Please notify K.S. Choi Corp - your seller- directly and immediately for any issues with the extension tubes. We will send you a replacement extension tube for all tubes deemed faulty within 30 days from the date of purchase.

19 x Plastic Cupping Cups (Premium Quality, 13 of the 2" dia cups, 1 of the 1.8", 2 of the 1.6", 2 of the 1.3", and 1 of the 1.1" dia cups), 1 x Hand Pump, 1 x extension tube (optional), 1 x Carrying Case (Professional Look).
Acuzone Cupping Sets are used by 2016 Rio Olympic Athletes Magnificent quality plastic cups with shockproof & heatproof that can be sterilized with boiling water.
It is the finest baby bottle plastic material used for strong, clean, and leaves no marks and scratches easy.
The Manual is included (One page). Illustrates how to use the set. (This manual does not illustrate cupping techniques)
